tags.name: zui-well
tags.description: Use zui-well's to attract users attention to a message. There are various types of well's depending on messaging needs. `` can optionally be delayed in appearing and then animate in. consumers can specify whether they want it `animated` or it will default to static.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The type of well to display. Defaults to `'info'`.

attributes.name: no-icon
attributes.description: Whether or not you want to display an icon in your well

attributes.name: dismissible
attributes.description: Whether or not you want your well to be dismissible

attributes.name: banner
attributes.description: Whether or not you want your well to span the entire width of its parent container

attributes.name: no-animation
attributes.description: DEPRECATED, will be removed in a future release; use "animated" instead

attributes.name: static
attributes.description: DEPRECATED, will be removed in a future release; use "animated" instead

attributes.name: animated
attributes.description: If set, the well will slide down

attributes.name: well-dimiss
attributes.description: Add this attribute to the corresponding `<* slot="action" well-dimiss></*>`, when clicked it will close if attribute is present

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of well to display. Defaults to `'info'`.

properties.name: noIcon
properties.description: Whether or not you want to display an icon in your well

properties.name: dismissible
properties.description: Whether or not you want your well to be dismissible

properties.name: banner
properties.description: Whether or not you want your well to span the entire width of its parent container

properties.name: noAnimation
properties.description: DEPRECATED, will be removed in a future release; use "animated" instead

properties.name: static
properties.description: DEPRECATED, will be removed in a future release; use "animated" instead

properties.name: animated
properties.description: If set, the well will slide down

slots.description: Unnamed slot, pass body text into

slots.name: action
slots.description: Slot in `action` button or link that can also dismiss the well i.e. `<button slot="action">Got it</button>`

cssProperties.name: --zui-well-animation-margin
cssProperties.description: Determine the margin size that animates in
